title: Equatorial Guinea: the African Development Bank reviews its $167 million project portfolio
description:
The African Development Bank Group (www.AfDB.org/) held a joint review of its project portfolio in the Republic of Equatorial Guinea in Malabo from 27 to 31 October.

An action plan to improve the portfolio's performance was approved at the end of the meeting. Stakeholders plan to set up a coordinat...

title: Prashant Kumar Das appointed as India's next envoy to Equatorial Guinea
description:
New Delhi [India], July 10 (ANI): Prashant Kumar Das has been appointed as the next Ambassador of India to Equatorial Guinea, the Ministry of External Affairs said in an official statement on Monday.



Das is presently tasked as a Consul General in Phuentsholing in Bhutan.
